Idioma2:
Overview

- Release date: 2020, September
- Known as LG Wing 5G
- Android 10
- Size of 169.5 x 74.5 x 10.9 mm
- 260 grams

Display

- 6.8" FullHD 20.5:9 resolution (2460 x 1080)
- Rotating P-OLED (G-OLED secondary display of 3.9" (1080 x 1240))
- Screen-to-body ratio: ~87%
- 395 ppi density
- Corning Gorilla Glass 5

Memory

- 128 / 256 GB mass storage
- Expandable with microSD up to 512 GB (uses SIM slot)
- 8 GB RAM (LPDDR4X, 2133 MHz)

Battery

- Non-removable 4000 mAh battery
- 24 hours talk time (3G)

Sensors

✔ Gyroscope
✔ Accelerometer
✔ Proximity
✔ Compass
✘ Barometer

Processor

- Qualcomm Snapdragon 765G (1 Kryo 475 Prime up to 2.4 GHz + 1 Kryo 475 Gold up to 2.2 GHz + 6 Kryo 475 Silver up to 1.8 GHz)
- GPU: Adreno 620

Cameras

- 64 MP (f/1.8 and sensor size 1/1.72"), 13 MP (f/1.9) and 12 MP (f/2.2) main cameras
- MOTORIZED POP-UP 32 MP (f/1.9 and sensor size 1/2.8") front

✔ Optical + Electronic Image Stabilizer
✔ Main LED flash
✘ Front LED flash

Sound

- Loudspeaker(s): Mono
- Microphone(s): Stereo

Connectivity

- Supports 5G up to 2 Gbps
- Bluetooth 5.1
- Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac

✘ Headphone jack
✘ Type-C USB
✔ OTG USB
✘ FM Radio
✔ NFC
✘ eSIM

· 2G networks
850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
· 3G networks
850 / 900 / 1900 / 2100
· 4G networks
2 / 3 / 4 / 5 / 7 / 12 / 13 / 20 / 28 / 46 / 48 / 66
· 5G networks
2 / 5 / 66 / 260 / 261

Additional features

- Always-On display
- Dual SIM version
- Fast battery charging (Quick Charge 4.0+)
- Fingerprint reader
- IP68 certified
- MIL-STD-810G certified
- USB Power Delivery 3.0
- Wireless charging
